Title: Sherlock Holmes
Overview: Eccentric consulting detective Sherlock Holmes and Doctor John Watson battle to bring down a new nemesis and unravel a deadly plot that could destroy England.
Keywords: detective, scotland yard, coffin, black magic, arrest, partner, sherlock holmes, murder, steampunk, pentagram, clue
production_companies: Village Roadshow Pictures, Silver Pictures, Warner Bros., Internationale Filmproduktion Blackbird Dritte, Wigram Productions
Cast: Robert Downey Jr., Jude Law, Rachel McAdams
